metadata.title: CVE-2023-28487 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Sudo before 1.9.13 does not escape control characters in sudoreplay output.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.21p2-3ubuntu1.6
sudo-ldap - 1.8.21p2-3ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.21p2-3ubuntu1.6').
